The Faithful: /TÕüHƒì ÀàfƒÅTHf…ôl/ ùòØùò∞ùò∂ùòØ - those who believe CLG will rise again for the third title#DefendTheFaith #CLGWIN pic.twitter.com/5v9usZyE8c

(Directing, Producing, Filming, Color correction, Keying)  JANUARY 2023

"I love the team and I love the learning experience."After an emotional victory in overtime by @Filipinoman, he gives us a heart-felt message about what it truly means to compete on #SFLUS2022, heading into playoff season and what teamwork is all about. #CLGWIN | #CLGFIGHTING pic.twitter.com/6whwX4XsAT

‚Äî Run It FGC (@RunItFGC) January 14, 2023




üß™ Good chemistryüí™ Hard workü§ù Trust @SamuraiFGC breaks down yesterday's #SFLUS2022 match and how @CLGFGC's Street Fighter League team has come together with one focus in mind: to be the best.@CapcomFighters | #CLGFIGHTING pic.twitter.com/7oPu1lLMZ0

‚Äî NRG Kia League (@NRGLeague) November 13, 2022

title: About
text:
I‚Äôm studying Statistics and Data Science at UCLA and am pursuing a career in esports. Most recently, I worked on Apex Legends Esports tracking data analytics, producing content, covering socials, and coordinating partnerships. However, I‚Äôve worked extensively in freelance video production for clients like Raidiant, Monkey Bubble, and Washington Justice (OWL) and interning for organizations like Counter Logic Gaming (LCS/FGC) and Philadelphia Fusion (OWL).




B.S. Statistics and Data Science  3.92 GPA  Sep 2021 - June 2025






Apex Legends Esports Content and Socials Event Contractor  Jan 2025 - Feb 2025
Apex Legends Esports Partnerships Intern  Jun 2024 - Sep 2024
Apex Legends Esports Program Management Intern  Jun 2023 - Sep 2023



Counter Logic Gaming  Video Production Intern  Oct 2022 - Apr 2023



Philadelphia Fusion  Video Production Intern  Jun 2022 - Dec 2022
